0.1.name: wordpress/contentmixx
0.1.description:
This plugin retrieves one or more random post/page or both of them from your WordPress installation Arguments: from (string) - show only posts, or pages, or both - possible values: post | page numberposts (integer) - number of posts/pages to return categories (integers, separated by commas) - limits returned posts to posts filed under categories found in arguments exclude (integers, separated by commas) - limits returned posts to posts NOT filed under categories found in arguments

Sample Code:
    <?php
    $myposts = contentmixx( 'from=post&numberposts=2&categories=8' );
    foreach( $myposts as $post ) {
        setup_postdata( $post ); 
    ?>
        <div class="sideBarPost">
            <h3><a href="<?php the_permalink() ?>"><?php the_title() ?></a></h3>
            <p><?php the_
